subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kevin Weekes played in place of Martin Brodeur, and gave up four goals, including two 5-on-3 power-play goals, before being pulled after two periods of a 5-2 loss.
snippet: Kevin Weekes played in place of Martin Brodeur, and gave up four goals, including two 5-on-3 power-play goals, before being pulled after two periods of a 5-2 loss.
